overview: A shoe company executive who has mortgaged everything he has becomes a victim of extortion when his chauffeur's son is kidnapped and is conflicted over whether he should pay the ransom.
tagline: From Akira Kurosawa, director of "Yojimbo" and "Sanjuro" comes a tense, taut film of a modern "perfect crime" with more excitement than even Hitchcock could create.
cast: Toshirō Mifune|Tatsuya Nakadai|Kyōko Kagawa|Tatsuya Mihashi|Isao Kimura
